streamerbot.header: Connect with {LINK} to trigger its actions from Twitchat's Triggers
streamerbot.instructions: In Streamer.bot, go under "Servers/Clients" => "WebSocket server", tick the "Auto Start WebSockets server" option and click "Start server"
streamerbot.connect_error:
Connection to Streamber.bot failed.
Make sure Streamer.bot is started and HTTP server enabled.
